content:
Zadnja sprememba: FiskalnaFinta 17.01.2024 08:31
As announced on 25 October 2023,
the Company received a positive Arbitration Tribunal binding
interim decision, confirming Ascent Slovenia Limited (ASL)'s
entitlement to proceeds above the baseline production profile from
all wells in the concession area.
Verjetno je to naš razlog za željo po samouničenju.
